nodes.text: The Imperial crawler tank was a model of treaded military ground transport used by the reconstituted Sith Empire throughout the Great Galactic War and into the Galactic War.

During the game they can be found at planets that have both a Galactic Republic and an Imperial presence. They are found on Dromund Kaas, Balmorra, Quesh, Corellia, Taris, Hoth, Alderaan (Damaged, as well as working), and Tatooine. They are the Imperial version of the Manka-class armored transport.
